This tool can calculate the [[distance]] between two points.

<onlyinclude>{| class="wikitable calculator-container calculatorgadget-enabled" style="display: none; {{{style|}}}"
|+ Distance calculator
! Point !! A !! B
|-
! X
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=ax|size=6|default=0}}
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=bx|size=6|default=0}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dx|formula=abs(ax-bx)|default=0}}
|-
! Y
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=ay|size=6|default=0}}
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=by|size=6|default=0}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dy|formula=ifzero(horizontal,abs(ay-by))|default=0}}
|-
! Z
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=az|size=6|default=0}}
| {{Simplecalc|type=number|id=bz|size=6|default=0}}{{Simplecalc|type=hidden|id=dz|formula=abs(az-bz)|default=0}}
|-
! Type
| colspan="2" | {{Simplecalc|id=absolute|name=distype|type=radio|default=1}} {{Simplecalc label|for=absolute|label=Absolute}} {{Simplecalc|id=horizontal|name=distype|type=radio|default=0}} {{Simplecalc label|for=horizontal|label=Horizontal}}
|-
! Euclidean
| colspan="2" | {{Simplecalc|type=plain|decimals=5|formula=sqrt(dx*dx+dy*dy+dz*dz)|default=0.00000}}
|-
! Taxicab
| colspan="2" | {{Simplecalc|type=plain|formula=dx+dy+dz|default=0}}
|-
! Chebyshev
| colspan="2" | {{Simplecalc|type=plain|formula=max(dx,dy,dz)|default=0}}
